wikipedia_page.main: Paul 'Patch' Atcheson (born 17 May 1973) is a former Wales international rugby league footballer who played in the 1990s and 2000s. He played at representative level for Great Britain and Wales, and at club level for the Widnes Vikings (two spells), Wigan (Heritage № 877), Oldham Bears and St Helens, as a fullback.
